amendment.description: To provide funding for the suppression and control of Mormon crickets in western States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1220 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1220 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To provide funding for the suppression and control of Mormon crickets in western States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1220 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1220 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 1092.
